msg: Rework fixes for SchemaValidator and XMLMutex to keep the interfaces

author: jstrachan
msg: Moved the REST module to the camel-web module which better reflects its dual nature as a REST API and a web application

author: arkurth
msg: Set the Subversion properties on vcld to:
keywords: Date Revision Author HeadURL Id
vcld has to manually be set to executable after you check it out.  The Subversion executable property will prevent this from having to be done.
The $Id: tag is not being updated when vcld is committed.  The keywords property should fix this.
